languages.text: Енхо Сон выслушал сообщение и хрип с удивительно спокойным лицом, затем нажал кнопку вокса, и столь же спокойным голосом произнес длинное витиеватое ругательство, в основном сводящееся к сомнению в умственных способностях собеседника. Повернувшись к Вольному Торговцу, он заметил: "Прошу прощения, Лорд-капитан. Капитан Вести из второго отряда — известный шутник".

traits.locale_text: Енхо Сон выслушал сообщение и хрип с удивительно спокойным лицом, затем нажал кнопку вокса, и столь же спокойным голосом произнес длинное витиеватое ругательство, в основном сводящееся к сомнению в умственных способностях собеседника. Повернувшись к Вольному Торговцу, он заметил: "Прошу прощения, Лорд-капитан. Капитан Вести из второго отряда — известный шутник".

languages.text: Young-ho Sohn listened to the transmission and the final rasp with a surprisingly calm expression, then pressed the vox button and in a similarly calm voice let loose a stream of florid swearing, which centred on casting aspersions on his interlocutor's intellectual capabilities. Turning to the Rogue Trader, he remarked, "Apologies, Lord Captain. Captain Vesti from the second unit is well known for his pranks."
languages.original_text: Енхо Сон выслушал сообщение и хрип с удивительно спокойным лицом, затем нажал кнопку вокса, и столь же спокойным голосом произнес длинное витиеватое ругательство, в основном сводящееся к сомнению в умственных способностях собеседника. Повернувшись к Вольному Торговцу, он заметил: "Прошу прощения, Лорд-капитан. Капитан Вести из второго отряда — известный шутник".

Turning to the Rogue Trader, he remarked, "Apologies, Lord Captain. Captain Vesti from the second unit is well known for his pranks."

Turning to the Rogue Trader, he remarked, "Apologies, Lord Captain. Captain Vesti from the second unit is well known for his pranks."

Young-ho Sohn listened to the transmission and the final rasp with a surprisingly calm expression, then pressed the vox button and in a similarly calm voice let loose a stream of florid swearing, which centred on casting aspersions on his interlocutor's intellectual capabilities. Turning to the Rogue Trader, he remarked, "Apologies, Lord Captain. Captain Vesti from the second unit is well known for his pranks."

languages.text: Young-ho Sohn escuchó la transmisión y el último jadeo con una expresión sorprendentemente tranquila. Acto seguido, pulsó el botón del voco y, con tono igualmente tranquilo, soltó una ráfaga de insultos de lo más variopintos, centrados en poner en duda la capacidad mental de su interlocutor. Al terminar, se giró hacia {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y se explicó: «Lo lamento, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. El capitán Vesti de la segunda unidad es de sobra conocido por sus bromas».
languages.original_text: Young-ho Sohn listened to the transmission and the final rasp with a surprisingly calm expression, then pressed the vox button and in a similarly calm voice let loose a stream of florid swearing, which centred on casting aspersions on his interlocutor's intellectual capabilities. Turning to the Rogue Trader, he remarked, "Apologies, Lord Captain. Captain Vesti from the second unit is well known for his pranks."

traits.locale_text: Young-ho Sohn escuchó la transmisión y el último jadeo con una expresión sorprendentemente tranquila. Acto seguido, pulsó el botón del voco y, con tono igualmente tranquilo, soltó una ráfaga de insultos de lo más variopintos, centrados en poner en duda la capacidad mental de su interlocutor. Al terminar, se giró hacia {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y se explicó: «Lo lamento, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. El capitán Vesti de la segunda unidad es de sobra conocido por sus bromas».

languages.text: 宋永和以令人难以置信的平静态度听着这些讯息与最后的喘息声，之后按下了音阵装置的按钮，以同样平静的声音骂出了一大串花里胡哨的脏话，核心内容基本都是在贬低对方的智力水平。随后，他转向行商浪人，开了口。“我很抱歉，舰长大人，但第二小队的维斯提上尉向来喜欢搞恶作剧，大家都很了解他这个人。”
languages.original_text: Young-ho Sohn listened to the transmission and the final rasp with a surprisingly calm expression, then pressed the vox button and in a similarly calm voice let loose a stream of florid swearing, which centred on casting aspersions on his interlocutor's intellectual capabilities. Turning to the Rogue Trader, he remarked, "Apologies, Lord Captain. Captain Vesti from the second unit is well known for his pranks."

traits.locale_text: 宋永和以令人难以置信的平静态度听着这些讯息与最后的喘息声，之后按下了音阵装置的按钮，以同样平静的声音骂出了一大串花里胡哨的脏话，核心内容基本都是在贬低对方的智力水平。随后，他转向行商浪人，开了口。“我很抱歉，舰长大人，但第二小队的维斯提上尉向来喜欢搞恶作剧，大家都很了解他这个人。”

languages.text: ソン・ヨンホは、驚くほど穏やかな表情でその音声と最後のガサガサという音に耳を傾ける。それからヴォクスのボタンを押して、同じ様に穏やかな声で、通話相手の知的能力への非難を中心とした激しい悪口を連発した。彼は自由開拓者の方を向いて告げた。「申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。第2部隊のヴェスティ中隊長はいたずら者で有名なのです」
languages.original_text: Young-ho Sohn listened to the transmission and the final rasp with a surprisingly calm expression, then pressed the vox button and in a similarly calm voice let loose a stream of florid swearing, which centred on casting aspersions on his interlocutor's intellectual capabilities. Turning to the Rogue Trader, he remarked, "Apologies, Lord Captain. Captain Vesti from the second unit is well known for his pranks."

traits.locale_text: ソン・ヨンホは、驚くほど穏やかな表情でその音声と最後のガサガサという音に耳を傾ける。それからヴォクスのボタンを押して、同じ様に穏やかな声で、通話相手の知的能力への非難を中心とした激しい悪口を連発した。彼は自由開拓者の方を向いて告げた。「申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。第2部隊のヴェスティ中隊長はいたずら者で有名なのです」

languages.text: Young-ho Sohn hatte der Übertragung und dem letzten Röcheln überraschend ruhig zugehört, und nun drückte er die Vox-Taste und äußerte mit ähnlich ruhiger Stimme eine Tirade blumiger Flüche, die die mangelnden intellektuellen Fähigkeiten seines Gesprächspartners zum Thema hatten. Anschließend wendete er sich {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu und sagte: "Verzeiht, Lord Captain. Captain Vesti von der zweiten Einheit ist bekannt für seine Streiche."
languages.original_text: Young-ho Sohn listened to the transmission and the final rasp with a surprisingly calm expression, then pressed the vox button and in a similarly calm voice let loose a stream of florid swearing, which centred on casting aspersions on his interlocutor's intellectual capabilities. Turning to the Rogue Trader, he remarked, "Apologies, Lord Captain. Captain Vesti from the second unit is well known for his pranks."

traits.locale_text: Young-ho Sohn hatte der Übertragung und dem letzten Röcheln überraschend ruhig zugehört, und nun drückte er die Vox-Taste und äußerte mit ähnlich ruhiger Stimme eine Tirade blumiger Flüche, die die mangelnden intellektuellen Fähigkeiten seines Gesprächspartners zum Thema hatten. Anschließend wendete er sich {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu und sagte: "Verzeiht, Lord Captain. Captain Vesti von der zweiten Einheit ist bekannt für seine Streiche."

languages.text: Young-ho Sohn était resté étonnamment calme. Une fois la transmission terminée, il appuya sur le bouton du vox et, sans jamais hausser le ton, abreuva son interlocuteur d'injures élaborées qui insultaient principalement les capacités intellectuelles de ce dernier. Il se tourna ensuite vers {name} et déclara : « Mes excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Le capitaine Vesti de la deuxième unité est bien connu pour ses plaisanteries. »
languages.original_text: Young-ho Sohn listened to the transmission and the final rasp with a surprisingly calm expression, then pressed the vox button and in a similarly calm voice let loose a stream of florid swearing, which centred on casting aspersions on his interlocutor's intellectual capabilities. Turning to the Rogue Trader, he remarked, "Apologies, Lord Captain. Captain Vesti from the second unit is well known for his pranks."

traits.locale_text: Young-ho Sohn était resté étonnamment calme. Une fois la transmission terminée, il appuya sur le bouton du vox et, sans jamais hausser le ton, abreuva son interlocuteur d'injures élaborées qui insultaient principalement les capacités intellectuelles de ce dernier. Il se tourna ensuite vers {name} et déclara : « Mes excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Le capitaine Vesti de la deuxième unité est bien connu pour ses plaisanteries. »

languages.text: Young-ho Sohn iletiyi ve sondaki hırgürü, insanı şaşırtan bir sakinlikle dinledi. Ardından voks düğmesine basarak sakin bir sesle konuşmaya başladı. Voksun diğer ucundaki kişinin entelektüel becerilerine odaklanan, hararetli küfürler yağdırıyordu. Diyecekleri bitince Hür Tacir'e dönerek özür diledi. "Mazur görün Lord Kaptan. İkinci birimin başındaki Yüzbaşı Vesti, eşek şakalarıyla ün salmıştır."
languages.original_text: Young-ho Sohn listened to the transmission and the final rasp with a surprisingly calm expression, then pressed the vox button and in a similarly calm voice let loose a stream of florid swearing, which centred on casting aspersions on his interlocutor's intellectual capabilities. Turning to the Rogue Trader, he remarked, "Apologies, Lord Captain. Captain Vesti from the second unit is well known for his pranks."
